attributes.additional_details:
Since being elected as Prime Minister Boris Johnson has failed on all of the major issues facing the country. 

1.He has failed to deliver on Brexit which he told us would be the easiest deal in history.
2. He has mishandled the covid crisis and caused untold misery to millions with constantly changing rules and rules that make no sense and that have made the crisis worse.
3. Unemployment is rocketing
4. The economy is in tatters
5. People with non covid medical are missing out on treatment as the NHS cannot cope

Boris Johnson has no grasp on crucial matters and is unfit to lead the government any further during this period of crisis.
attributes.background: Boris Johnson is unfit to lead the country and should resign from the Government.

rejection.details:
We can't publish petitions about honours or appointments. That includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or to resign.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could sign or start a petition about that.
